name: Unreal --The next generation of IRCd
short_description: UnrealIRCd is an IRC server based on the branch of IRCu called Dreamforge, formerly used by the DALnet IRC Network. Since development started on it (around May 1999) many new features has been added, modified, and many bugs fixed. Unreal runs both on *nix
